testcase.name: TC01_Reservation_Creation
testcase.system-out: Given user opens the URL "https://www.bluerentalcars.com/"..................passed When user navigate the login page...........................................passed And user enters manager_username and manager_password.......................passed Then verify the login is successful.........................................passed And capture the screenshot..................................................passed Given user is on the home page..............................................passed And select a car model "Maserati"...........................................passed And enter pick up field.....................................................passed And enter drop off field....................................................passed And Enter pick up date......................................................passed And Enter drop off date.....................................................passed And click continue reservation..............................................passed And verify complete reservation screen pops up..............................passed And enter card number.......................................................passed And enter name on the card..................................................passed And enter expire date and CVC...............................................passed And checks the agreement....................................................passed And click complete reservation..............................................passed Then verify "Reservation created successfully" pop up.......................passed
